stories.text:
I have this problem with YouTube.

I often watch SpaceX's launches, and generally try not to miss livestreams related to space flight.

Lately YouTube has been recommending me crypto scam livestreams on the landing page, even as the first recommendation.

I always report them, and while two of the streams which I reported a bit over a month ago got removed within a couple of hours, lately these streams not only continue to be online for days, but also continue to get recommended.

It really can't be that hard for YouTube to detect these scams.

--

Crew-4 Mission | Launch! Elon Musk gives an update on SpaceX Crew-4 Mission!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=buwHrP4XhK8

--

Crew-4 Mission | Launch! Elon Musk gives an update on SpaceX Crew-4 Mission

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dk1Xfwo9TGQ
